column1: 01:37|"Major Yun appeared at General Castleton's elbow
column2: and handed an interface to the base leader. General Castleton took it
column3: his face darkening and his frown deepening as he read it.

column1: What is it?"" she asked when he looked up. ""At 01:37 this morning
column2: an encrypted message was sent from inside the base."""|Outcasts|Gail Delaney
